title: NFL Mock Draft Monday 1.0: Breaking down Trevor Lawrence and the rest of the quarterbacks (Football 2/15)
description:
Welcome to draft season! Each Monday over the next few months, the Pick Six feed will be dedicated to draft content and mock drafts (with plenty of mid-week coverage as well). We start things today with a set-up of things to come. Trevor Lawrence is the blatantly obvious #1 overall selection as Ryan Wilson details what makes him such a great prospect. Then, we shift focus to the rest of the quarterback class and Wilson's unique rankings. Who's the 2nd-best QB behind Lawrence? Is it Justin Fields, Zach Wilson Mac Jones or even Trey Lance? Quarterbacks tend to dominate the pre-draft discussion, so we set the table here but will cover everything you need to know in the coming weeks regarding the 2021 NFL Draft. 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices

Then, we shift focus to the rest of the quarterback class and Wilson's unique rankings. Who's the 2nd-best QB behind Lawrence? Is it Justin Fields, Zach Wilson Mac Jones or even Trey Lance? Quarterbacks tend to dominate the pre-draft discussion, so we set the table here but will cover everything you need to know in the coming weeks regarding the 2021 NFL Draft.
